hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE/DOGE) vs. Blue Chip (BTC) Volatility Divergence in NEUTRAL-BEAR Transition
hypothesis_content.statement: When the regime shifts from NEUTRAL to BEAR (confidence > 60%), if the 3-day volatility ratio of a meme coin basket (PEPE, DOGE) to BTC rises above 2.0, shorting the meme basket against BTC will profit as risk-off flows disproportionately crush high-beta meme coin volatility and price over the next week.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In the early stages of a bear regime, capital flees the highest-risk, most speculative assets first. Meme coins exhibit extreme beta and volatility, which collapses relative to BTC as liquidity dries up and leverage unwinds. The volatility ratio is a leading indicator of relative performance.
entry_conditions: (PEPE 3-day realized volatility + DOGE 3-day realized volatility)/2 > (BTC 3-day realized volatility * 2.0)
Aggregate crypto funding rates turn negative
BTC dominance is increasing over past 48 hours

exit_conditions.take_profit: Meme basket/BTC volatility ratio falls below 1.5
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Regime shifts back to NEUTRAL or BULL

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Bear regime is shallow or quickly reversed, allowing meme coin volatility to remain elevated or even lead a snap-back rally.
